card.name: Dreadknight Duelist
card.text: Whenever Dreadknight Duelist enters or attacks, you may discard a card. If you do, draw a card. {4}{B}{R}, Sacrifice Dreadknight Duelist: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste and can't block until end of turn.

card.name: Assemble the Mob
card.text: Create two 1/1 red Soldier creature tokens. Revolt — If a permanent you controlled left the battlefield this turn, those tokens get +1/+1 and gain haste until end of turn.

card.name: Gift of Deadwoods
card.text: Enchant land When Gift of Deadwoods enters, mill three cards, then return a creature or land card milled this way to your hand. At the beginning of combat on each player's turn, if you're ancient, you may have enchanted land become a 4/4 Elemental creature until end of turn. It's still a land. (You're ancient as long as you have eight or more total lands in play or in your graveyard.)

card.name: Collector of the Lost
card.text: Multitude {4}{G}{W} (You may cast this for {4}{G}{W}. When you do, copy it.) Creature tokens you control get +1/+1 and have vigilance.

card.name: Wild Huntsman
card.text: When Wild Huntsman enters, search your library for a land card and put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle. Then if you're ancient, creatures you control get +2/+0 and gain haste until end of turn. (You're ancient as long as you have eight or more total lands in play or in your graveyard.)

card.name: Gravepact Wisdom
card.text: When Gravepact Wisdom enters, reveal the top three cards of your library. Put one into your hand and the rest into your graveyard. Whenever you cast a spell from your graveyard, each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.

card.name: Arisen Hero
card.text: Flying, vigilance Whenever Arisen Hero attacks, if you control three or more Spirits, you gain 3 life and draw a card.

card.name: Whisper of the Dead
card.text: Flying When Whisper of the Dead enters or dies, exile another target permanent you control. Return that card to the battlefield under your control at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Deadwood Cult
card.text: Trample Whenever you draw a card except the first one you draw in each of your draw steps, put a +1/+1 counter on Deadwood Cult.

card.name: Rose Court Favored
card.text: Prowess {U}{R}, Exile Rose Court Favored from your graveyard: When you cast your next instant or sorcery spell this turn, copy it. You may choose new targets for the copy.

card.name: Whisperlit Meditation
card.text: When Whisperlit Meditation enters, put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two target creatures. {1}{W}, Sacrifice Whisperlit Meditation: Tap up to two target creatures.

card.name: Moonlit Meditation
card.text: When Moonlit Meditation enters, draw three cards, then put two cards from your hand on top of your library. {1}{U}, Sacrifice Moonlit Meditation: Shuffle up to three target cards from your graveyard into your library.

card.name: Grovelit Meditation
card.text: When Grovelit Meditation enters, you gain 4 life. {1}{G}, Sacrifice Grovelit Meditation: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal those cards, put one onto the battlefield tapped and the other into your hand, then shuffle.

card.name: Razelit Meditation
card.text: When Razelit Meditation enters, create two 1/1 red Soldier creature tokens. {1}{R}, Sacrifice Razelit Meditation: Razelit Meditation deals 3 damage to target player or planeswalker.

card.name: Gravelit Meditation
card.text: When Gravelit Meditation enters, you may have each player sacrifice a creature. {1}{B}, Sacrifice Gravelit Meditation: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Incendiary Flow
card.text: Incendiary Flow deals 3 damage to any target. If a creature dealt damage this way would die this turn, exile it instead.

card.name: Embrace Hopelessness
card.text: Discard up to two cards, then draw that many cards. If you discarded two cards that share a type this way, draw a card.

card.name: Bearer of Autumn
card.text: Whenever a land card is put into your graveyard from anywhere, Bearer of Autumn gets +1/+1 and gains trample until end of turn.

card.name: Winding Way
card.text: Choose creature or land. Reveal the top four cards of your library. Put all cards of the chosen type revealed this way into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.

card.name: Clutch of the Web
card.text: Choose one — • Clutch of the Web deals 6 damage to target creature with flying. • Clutch of the Web deals 1 damage to each creature with flying.

card.name: Reclaimed by Nature
card.text: Put target artifact, enchantment, or card in a graveyard on the bottom of its owner's library.

card.name: Left to Rust
card.text: Choose one — • Destroy target artifact. • Left to Rust deals 2 damage to each opponent.

card.name: Ichor Connoisseur
card.text: Trample {1}{R}, Discard Ichor Connoisseur: Ichor Connoisseur deals 2 damage to any target.

card.name: Graverot Soothsayer
card.text: When Graverot Soothsayer enters, you may sacrifice another creature. If you do, return that card from your graveyard to the battlefield under your control at the beginning of the next end step.

card.text: This spell costs {1} less to cast for each land card in your graveyard. Destroy target creature. Its controller loses 2 life.

card.name: Twilight Ambush
card.text: Destroy target creature with power or toughness 2 or less.

card.name: Blasphemous Bonecaller
card.text: When Blasphemous Bonecaller enters or dies, you draw a card and you lose 1 life. {1}{B}, Discard Blasphemous Bonecaller: You draw a card and you lose 1 life.

card.name: Blood for Bones
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature. Return a creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield, then return another creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.text: This spell costs {2} less to cast if it targets a creature you control that attacked this turn. Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. It fights target creature you don't control.

card.text: Choose one — • Counter target spell unless its controller pays {2}. • Tap target permanent. If it's a creature, it doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

card.text: Create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying. If you've cast another instant or sorcery spell this turn, create two of those tokens instead.

card.text: Sparring Partner has first strike as long as it's attacking. When Sparring Partner dies, create a 1/1 red Soldier creature token.

card.name: Wildcourt Wishgiver
card.text: Multitude {4}{W} (You may cast this for {4}{W}. When you do, copy it.) {W}, {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on another target creature.

card.name: Lichbane Captain
card.text: Other Soldier creatures you control get +1/+1.

card.name: Guardian of the Lost
card.text: Flying Creature tokens you control get +1/+1 and have flying.

card.name: Starblessed Trance
card.text: As long as it's your turn, instant and sorcery cards in your graveyard have escape. The escape cost is equal to the card's mana cost plus "Discard a land card."

card.name: Unburden the Mind
card.text: Target player reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card. Escape—{2}{B}, Exile five other cards from your graveyard. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its escape cost.)

card.name: Vanity Haunt
card.text: Flying Whenever you draw your second card each turn, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.

card.name: Prototypical Broodwing
card.text: Flying When Prototypical Broodwing enters, choose one — • Return target creature to its owner's hand. • Return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Twincast Disciple
card.text: Prowess Whenever you copy a spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Twincast Disciple.

card.name: Starcrossed Arcana
card.text: Copy target spell you control with mana value 4 or less. You may choose new targets for the copy.

card.name: Dissolve Memory's Hold
card.text: Whenever you draw a card, target player mills a card. {4}{U}, Sacrifice Dissolve Memory's Hold: Target player mills five cards.

card.name: Starfouled Arcanist
card.text: Prowess Whenever Starfouled Arcanist attacks, you may tap target creature. If Starfouled Arcanist has greater power than it, that creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

card.name: Secretkeeper of the Dead
card.text: Whenever Secretkeeper of the Dead enters or you cast another spell from a graveyard, draw a card. Escape—{5}{U}{U}, Exile five other cards from your graveyard. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its escape cost.)

card.name: Mindblight Connoisseur
card.text: When Mindblight Connoisseur enters, each opponent discards a card. Each opponent who didn't discard a card with mana value 3 or greater this way loses 2 life.

card.name: Fleshless Assailant
card.text: Fleshless Assailant enters tapped. Whenever you cast a spell from your graveyard or a creature you control enters from a graveyard, return Fleshless Assailant from your graveyard to the battlefield at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Augur of Gnarled Roots
card.text: Whenever another nontoken creature you control dies, you may mill a card. If you're ancient, instead you may draw a card. (You're ancient as long as you have eight or more total lands in play or in your graveyard.)

card.name: Zombie Plague
card.text: When Zombie Plague enters, return up to one target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. {1}, Discard two cards: Each opponent loses 2 life. Create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token. It can't block this turn.

card.name: Defected Reaper
card.text: Menace Escape—{2}{B}{B}, Exile five other cards from your graveyard. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its escape cost.)

card.name: Rose Court Ambitions
card.text: Whenever you cast a black spell, each opponent loses X life, where X is the number of colors spent to cast it. If X is four or more, each opponent sacrifices a creature.

card.name: Call of the Crypt
card.text: {B}: Exile two target cards from graveyards. If they share a card type, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.

card.name: Starfouled Scion
card.text: When Starfouled Scion enters, look at the top seven cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

card.name: Solemn Graveyard
card.text: Nonland permanent cards in graveyards and libraries can't enter the battlefield. Players can't cast spells from graveyards or libraries.

card.name: Dormant Stream
card.text: {T}, Pay 1 life: Add {W} or {U}. {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Dormant Stream: Draw a card. Activate only if you control five or more lands.

card.name: Dormant Clearing
card.text: {T}, Pay 1 life: Add {G} or {W}. {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Dormant Clearing: Draw a card. Activate only if you control five or more lands.

card.name: Dormant Altar
card.text: {T}, Pay 1 life: Add {B} or {R}. {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Dormant Altar: Draw a card. Activate only if you control five or more lands.

card.name: Dormant Cavern
card.text: {T}, Pay 1 life: Add {U} or {B}. {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Dormant Cavern: Draw a card. Activate only if you control five or more lands.

card.name: Dormant Peak
card.text: {T}, Pay 1 life: Add {R} or {G}. {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Dormant Peak: Draw a card. Activate only if you control five or more lands.

card.name: Arcane Cauldron
card.text: {2}, {T}: When you cast your next instant or sorcery spell this turn, copy it. If that spell targets a permanent you control, copy it an additional time. You may choose new targets for the copies.

card.name: Arcet's Scheming
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you draw a card and you lose 1 life. You may repeat this process up to two times.

card.name: Destiny of Undeath
card.text: Rather than pay the mana cost for a spell, you may discard a card that shares a color with that spell. If you would be dealt damage, discard that many cards instead. When you have no cards in hand, you lose the game.

card.name: Vibrant Vengeance
card.text: When Vibrant Vengeance enters, all creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn. Whenever you tap a land for mana, add one mana of any type that land produced.

card.name: Bloodfrenzied Vanguard
card.text: Trample, haste Revolt — At the beginning of your end step, sacrifice Bloodfrenzied Vanguard unless another permanent you controlled left the battlefield this turn.

card.name: Kywon's Progeny
card.text: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, create an X/X blue Drake creature token with flying, where X is that spell's mana value. At the beginning of your upkeep, if Drakes you control have total power 8 or greater, draw a card. Then you may cast an instant or sorcery spell from your hand without paying its mana cost.

card.name: Approaching Greatness
card.text: Search your library for an enchantment card with mana value 5 or greater, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. You gain 5 life.

card.name: Lucille's Conquest
card.text: Whenever one or more sources an opponent controls deal damage to you, Lucille's Conquest deals 4 damage to that player unless they sacrifice two permanents. At the beginning of your upkeep, Lucille's Conquest deals 4 damage to each opponent unless that player sacrifices two permanents.

card.name: Ikel's Legacy
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, create two 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens. Whenever a nontoken creature you control enters, sacrifice it and put a +1/+1 counter on each creature token you control.

card.name: Wipe the World Clean
card.text: Destroy all creatures and all planeswalkers. Each opponent who controlled two or more permanents destroyed this way draws a card.

card.name: Lichbane Forerunner
card.text: Multitude {2}{W}{W} (You may cast this for {2}{W}{W}. When you do, copy it.) Whenever Lichbane Forerunner attacks, another target attacking Soldier you control gains indestructible until end of turn.

card.name: Fredrick "The Hammer" Lysus
card.text: Vigilance, haste Revolt — At the beginning of each end step, if a permanent you controlled left the battlefield this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.

card.name: Wildkin Imposter
card.text: Flash Multitude {4}{U}{U} (You may cast this for {4}{U}{U}. When you do, copy it.) You may have Wildkin Imposter enter as a copy of any creature on the battlefield.

card.name: Vengeful Whisper
card.text: Flying, lifelink When Vengeful Whisper dies, create a white enchantment token named Memorial with "At the beginning of your upkeep, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying."

card.name: Memorial BLR
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.

card.name: Gravefire Arcanist
card.text: Prowess When Gravefire Arcanist enters, when you cast your next instant or sorcery spell this turn, copy it. You may choose new targets for the copy. Escape—{1}{R}{R}, Exile six other cards from your graveyard. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its escape cost.)

card.name: Burning Wisdom
card.text: When Burning Wisdom enters, exile the top card of your library. You may play it until end of turn. Whenever a source you control deals noncombat damage to an opponent, exile Burning Wisdom. You may play it during your next turn.

card.name: Poet of Glory
card.text: Whenever you cast an enchantment spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Poet of Glory. Whenever Poet of Glory becomes tapped, return up to one target enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Revolutionary Recruiter
card.text: {2}, Sacrifice a land: Create two 1/1 red Soldier creature tokens. Revolt — Whenever Revolutionary Recruiter attacks, if a permanent you controlled left the battlefield this turn, other creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Brilliant Mandate
card.text: Each player discards their hand, then draws seven cards. Add {R}{R}{R}.

card.name: Stellar Mandate
card.text: Exile the top six cards of target opponent's library. You may play cards exiled this way without paying their mana costs until the end of your next turn.

card.name: Stygian Mandate
card.text: You draw three cards and you lose 3 life. Creatures get -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the number of cards in your hand.

card.name: Immaculate Mandate
card.text: Choose artifact or enchantment. Return all noncreature cards of the chosen type from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Verdant Mandate
card.text: Distribute eight +1/+1 counters among any number of target creatures you control.

card.name: Waking Crag
card.text: Waking Crag enters tapped. {T}: Add {R} or {W}. {2}{R}{W}: Waking Crag becomes a red and white Elemental creature in addition to its other types until end of turn. Whenever Waking Crag attacks, creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Waking Glen
card.text: Waking Glen enters tapped. {T}: Add {G} or {U}. {4}{G}{U}: Waking Glen becomes a blue and green Elemental creature in addition to its other types until end of turn. Whenever Waking Glen deals combat damage to a player, untap each land you control.

card.name: Waking Vista
card.text: Waking Vista enters tapped. {T}: Add {U} or {R}. {1}{U}{R}: Waking Vista becomes a blue and red Elemental creature in addition to its other types until end of turn. Whenever Waking Vista deals combat damage to an opponent, draw a card.

card.name: Waking Boneyard
card.text: Waking Boneyard enters tapped. {T}: Add {W} or {B}. {3}{W}{B}: Waking Boneyard becomes a white and black Elemental creature in addition to its other types until end of turn. When Waking Boneyard dies, if it's a creature, create two 1/1 white Spirit creature tokens with flying.

card.name: Waking Bog
card.text: Waking Bog enters tapped. {T}: Add {B} or {G}. {1}{B}{G}: Waking Bog becomes a black and green Elemental creature in addition to its other types until end of turn. Whenever Waking Bog deals combat damage to an opponent, return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Unrivaled Slayer
card.text: First strike, haste Whenever a player pays an alternate cost, Unrivaled Slayer deals 3 damage to that player. (Multitude and escape costs are alternate costs. So is casting a spell for free.)

card.name: Lucille's Edge
card.text: Lucille's Edge enters with a double strike counter on it if it wasn't cast. {R}: Lucille's Edge gets +1/+0 until end of turn. {R}: Lucille's Edge gains haste until end of turn. {R}: Lucille's Edge gains trample until end of turn.

card.name: Gilded Court
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Choose a basic land type. Gilded Court gains that type. (This effect lasts indefinitely.)

card.name: Dabbling Dangerously
card.text: Search your library for a nonblack card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. Create a Treasure token.

card.name: Emberwalker
card.text: Whenever Emberwalker enters or attacks, exile the top card of your library. You may play it until end of turn. As long as you're ancient, you may play cards exiled with Emberwalker. (You're ancient as long as you have eight or more total lands in play or in your graveyard.)

card.name: Unknowable Starspawn
card.text: When Unknowable Starspawn enters, target opponent chooses two — • You gain 4 life and that opponent loses 4 life. • That opponent sacrifices a creature. • That opponent discards a card.

card.name: All the Stars are Mine
card.text: When All the Stars are Mine enters and at the beginning of your upkeep, untap all noncreature permanents you don't control. You gain control of them until end of turn.

card.name: Persistent Deadwood
card.text: Persistent Deadwood can't block. As long as three or more cards were put into your graveyard from anywhere this turn, you may cast Persistent Deadwood from your graveyard.

card.name: Unending Chant
card.text: Multitude {5}{U}{U} (You may cast this for {5}{U}{U}. When you do, copy it.) Enchant player At the beginning of each end step, enchanted player mills X cards, where X is the number of cards put into their graveyard from anywhere this turn.

card.name: Primordial of Emila Glade
card.text: Flash When Primordial of Emila Glade enters, return up to two instant and/or sorcery cards from your graveyard to your hand. Once each turn, you may pay {U} rather than pay the mana cost for an instant or sorcery spell.

card.name: Natural Majesty
card.text: Draw a card for each creature you control. Then if you've drawn four or more cards this turn, create a 4/4 green Elemental creature token.

card.name: Gilded Reaper
card.text: Flying Once each turn, whenever you cast a black spell, you may pay 1 life. If you do, create a Treasure token. {W}{U}{B}{R}{G}: Each opponent loses 4 life and you gain 4 life.

card.text: Whenever Keeper of Death's Mysteries attacks, exile the top card of each player's library. Escape—{4}{U}{U}, Exile six other cards from your graveyard (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its escape cost.)

card.name: Reinstated Reaper
card.text: Menace Whenever an opponent loses life for the first time each turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Reinstated Reaper. If you're ancient, put two on it instead. (You're ancient as long as you have eight or more total lands in play or in your graveyard.)

card.name: Lichlord's Blade
Starfouled Cervid
card.text: Trample Whenever Starfouled Cervid attacks or dies, reveal the top seven cards of your library. You may put a non-Elk creature card from among them onto the battlefield. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

card.name: Restless Woods
card.text: Whenever one or more lands you control become a creature, distribute two +1/+1 counters among one or two lands you control. {4}{G}: Target land you control becomes a 4/4 green Elemental creature until end of turn.

card.name: Keening Belltower
card.text: Whenever you draw a card, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life. {T}: Each player draws a card. {2}, {T}: Draw a card.

card.name: Tugae Deathspinner
card.text: Flash Reach Whenever a creature you don't control dies, exile it and create a 1/2 green Spider creature token with reach.

card.name: Scion of the Wildcourt
card.text: Multitude {4}{G}{G} (You may cast this for {4}{G}{G}. When you do, copy it.) Trample As long as you control five or more creatures, Scion of the Wildcourt gets +2/+2.

card.name: Familial Roots
card.text: When Familial Roots enters, create a 1/1 green Elf creature token. At the beginning of your upkeep, create a token that's a copy of target token you control.

card.name: Wildcourt Seeker
card.text: Wildcourt Seeker's power and toughness are each equal to the number of land types among lands you control. Whenever Wildcourt Seeker enters or attacks, put up to one target land card from your graveyard onto the battlefield under your control.

card.name: Safe and Sound
card.text: Reveal the top six cards of your library. Put all land cards from among them onto the battlefield, then an opponent separates the remaining cards into two piles. Put one pile into your hand and the other into your graveyard.

card.name: Mindbreak Arcanist
card.text: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, surveil 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.) If you would draw a card while your library has no cards in it, you may instead put a card you own from exile or outside the game into your hand.

card.name: Tugae Corpsemaker
card.text: Multitude {5}{B}{G} (You may cast this for {5}{B}{G}. When you do, copy it.) Trample When Tugae Corpsemaker enters, each opponent sacrifices a creature.

card.name: Temporal Assassination
card.text: Whenever a creature an opponent controls leaves the battlefield, create a tapped Treasure token. {10}: Target opponent's life total becomes 1.

card.name: The Herald of the Wildcourt
card.text: You can't cast noncreature spells. Whenever you cast a creature spell, copy it. (The copy resolves as a token.)

card.name: Ethereal Grace
card.text: This spell costs {3} less to cast if you control three or more tokens. Create X 1/1 green Elf creature tokens.

card.name: Lumbering Foeslayer
card.text: Trample When Lumbering Foeslayer enters, it deals damage equal to its power to each opponent, each planeswalker, and each other creature.

card.text: At the beginning of your end step, you may sacrifice a creature. If you do, return a creature card with lesser or equal mana value from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Flesh Offered to the Dead
card.text: Create two 1/1 white Spirit creature tokens with flying. Escape—{2}{W}{B}, Exile four other cards from your graveyard. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its escape cost.)

card.name: Burning Roots
card.text: Search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield, then shuffle. Burning Roots deals X damage to any target, where X is the number of basic land types among lands you control.

card.text: Whenever you draw a card, put a +1/+1 counter on Startouched Deadwood. Whenever another creature you control deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.

card.text: {R}, Discard a land card: Eltensian Hospitality deals 3 damage to any target. Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell while you're ancient, copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy. (You're ancient as long as you have eight or more total lands in play or in your graveyard.)

card.name: Blood for Bones
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature. Return a creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield, then return another creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Assemble the Mob
card.text: Create two 1/1 red Soldier creature tokens. Revolt — If a permanent you controlled left the battlefield this turn, those tokens get +1/+1 and gain haste until end of turn.

card.name: New Divide
card.text: As New Divide enters, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters tapped. {T}, Sacrifice New Divide: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

card.name: Vibrant Vengeance
card.text: When Vibrant Vengeance enters, all creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn. Whenever you tap a land for mana, add one mana of any type that land produced.

card.name: All the Stars are Mine
card.text: When All the Stars are Mine enters and at the beginning of your upkeep, untap all noncreature permanents you don't control. You gain control of them until end of turn.

card.name: Dissolve Memory's Hold
card.text: Whenever you draw a card, target player mills a card. {4}{U}, Sacrifice Dissolve Memory's Hold: Target player mills five cards.

card.name: Call of the Crypt
card.text: {B}: Exile two target cards from graveyards. If they share a card type, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.

card.name: Lucille's Conquest
card.text: Whenever one or more sources an opponent controls deal damage to you, Lucille's Conquest deals 4 damage to that player unless they sacrifice two permanents. At the beginning of your upkeep, Lucille's Conquest deals 4 damage to each opponent unless that player sacrifices two permanents.

card.name: Master the Old Ways
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+0 and has trample. Escape—{1}{G}, Exile two other cards from your graveyard. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its escape cost.)

card.name: An Unlikely Peace
card.text: When An Unlikely Peace enters, mill two cards. {1}{G}: Return up to two target land cards from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Drift Off
card.text: Multitude {4}{W}{W} (You may cast this for {4}{W}{W}. When you do, copy it. (You may cast this for {4}{W}{W}. When you do, copy it.) When Drift Off enters the battlefield, exile target nonland permanent you don't control until Drift Off leaves the battlefield.
